On the November 25 Breitbart News Daily show on Sirius XM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will interview a number of guests, including former NYC Police Commissioner, Vice Chairman of K2 Intelligence, and author of the bestselling book, Vigilance: My Life Serving America and Protecting Its Empire City, Ray Kelly.

Breitbart London editor-in-chief Raheem Kassam, along with reporters Nick Hallett, Donna Rachel Edmunds, Oliver Lane, Sarkis Zeronian will provide live updates about the developing situations in Brussels, Turkey, Russia and more as national security events unfold.
Independent investigative reporter and host of “Full Measure” Sharyl Attkisson will discuss President Obama’s refusal to read intelligence on designated terrorists he does not think are terrorists.
General counsel to the Giuliani administration Larry Levy will also discuss the Islamic terror threat New York City faces, drawing from his experiences working under former NYC mayor Rudy Giuliani.

Sirius XM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Dr. Thomas Williams will discuss security measures taken by the Vatican and updates on the migrant crisis stemming from a mass exodus from the Third World to the First.
Bannon will interview Erik Prince, founder of Blackwater USA, about the security measures the West must take to secure the safety of its people and nations.
The program is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
